channel.title: Need help with 2 questions!
channel.description:
I need help really badly with these: :confused:
Question 1: How do i make safespots for a PK server?
Question 2: How do i make my own commands? (Example, ::starter, ::barrows, etc, etc) But i want to make my own like..[EXAMPLE, ::waterdog] and maybe that command will take you to the oceon and give you a whip..Something like that! Just so i can make my own. And make a effect on the command.
If these could both be answered i would be very happy!
Thank-you.
~Cookie[br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2007, 06:39:58 AM[/size][hr]Please help! [br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2007, 07:04:46 AM[/size][hr]I'm using phonescape source BTW[br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2007, 07:39:11 AM[/size][hr]Question 3: How do i add objects and dealete them? I can't find any tuts! Please tell me! And also if you can tell me how to add objects and dealete them, i also want to know how to "oporate" them and they give exp to a skill or something.
If you have found a tut that ansers that whole question (and the tut WORKS) please tell me, if not. dont tell me a tut. just explain normaly thanks.
~Cookie[br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2007, 07:42:14 AM[/size][hr]ANYONE!?!?!

item.title: Need help with 2 questions!
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

STOP DOUBLE POSTING! :mad: If you have to post twice just go to “Modify” And edit it. Dont post 5 lines of spam.

Ill get you those answers in a second.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,125884.0.html Go here to make safe zones.

To add objects and delete them Search for fedxers Tut on GlobalObjects.

To make commands

Telecommands

[code]
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Commandhere”))
{
teleportToX = X coordinates;
teleportToY = Y coordinates;
inwildy = false;
sendMessage(“Message”);
}[/code]

Legend
Commandhere - The command you want to type in say it said Pkzone. you would type ::pkzone.

Message - is the pop up message you want your players to know where they are.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 2 questions!
